report.title: Broad list of people for lookup
report.description: A list of people known to a website including both registered users and people only stored in a custom attribute.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM users u JOIN users_websites uw ON u.id = uw.user_id AND uw.site_role_id IS NOT NULL JOIN people p ON p.id = u.person_id AND p.deleted = false WHERE u.deleted = false AND #website_filter# AND lower(p.surname || ', ' || p.first_name) like lower(replace('#q#', '*', '%') || '%') UNION SELECT DISTINCT null::integer as id, v.text_value as person_name, null::text as email_address FROM sample_attribute_values v JOIN cache_samples_functional s on s.id=v.sample_id LEFT JOIN (people p JOIN users u ON u.person_id=p.id AND u.deleted=false JOIN users_websites uw ON u.id = uw.user_id AND uw.site_role_id IS NOT NULL and uw.website_id in (#website_ids#) ) ON lower(p.surname || ', ' || p.first_name) = lower(v.text_value) AND p.deleted=false WHERE v.deleted=false AND v.sample_attribute_id in (#attr_function#) AND s.website_id in (#website_ids#) AND lower(v.text_value) like lower(replace('#q#', '*', '%') || '%') AND p.id IS NULL

param.name: attr_function
param.display: Sysfunc of attribute to lookup in
param.preprocess: select id from list_sample_attributes where website_id in (#website_ids#) and system_function='#attr_function#'
